text: Albert Joe Demby (born 1934) is a Sierra Leonean politician. He was a member of the Sierra Leone People's Party. He was the Vice President of Sierra Leone from 29 March 1996 to 25 May 199. After the junta was removed in 1998, he continued his term until 1999, when he was dropped from vice presidency by Ahmad Tejan Kabbah. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:Vice- presidents of Sierra Leone Category:2021 deaths
title: Albert Joe Demby
